message.content:
cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper proposes a novel approach to incorporate safety into deep reinforcement learning, which involves using control-theoretic results and online Gaussian Process estimation. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Robotics (cs.RO) sub-categories, as these fields are closely related to reinforcement learning and control theory. Additionally, the paper deals with stability certificates, which is a topic in the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category. The paper also involves policy search and exploration, which are common topics in the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. Finally, the use of Gaussian Process estimation suggests that the paper may also belong to the Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-category, as Gaussian Processes are commonly used in this field for modeling and prediction.
